title: 'Fresh Air' Remembers Soul Singer And Songwriter Bobby Womack
teaser: Womack sang for a gospel group with his brothers called the Valentinos. It's All Over Now was their first international hit. Womack, who died June 27 at the age of 70, talked with Terry Gross in 1999.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
